content: Using our proprietary engineered AsCas12a nuclease and fix technology, we have developed engineered NK cells that have potent antitumor activity and substantially increased persistence in preclinical models, which we believe could lead to lower frequency dosing an important potential advantage for patients compared to many existing NK cell approaches.
